title: (x) The Sweet "Turn It Down" single cover - FF Zan {Lex}
content:
what d'ya say about this record sleeve?  
they don't make them like that anymore!  
and Thank Dog for that..  
: )

is it a font or made solely + sweetly for this record?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202090038im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sweet_4810.jpg)
author: rosmedia

comments.content: It's only a cheaply put together single cover, so I guess it must be some kind of font. Maybe made with dry transfer lettering.
cool. sweet thanx to both of you
